knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
plot_data_inc2 <- mf_results_inc_plant %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = -partition,
               names_to = "model",
               values_to = "order")
```

```{r}
ggplot(plot_data_inc2,aes(x = model))+
  geom_bar(aes(fill = as.character(order)))
```
